Class AtaxxMove

  • java.lang.Object

    public class AtaxxMove
extends GameMove
    A Class representing a move for Ataxx.

    Clase para representar un movimiento del juego Ataxx.

      Constructs a move for placing (int the ataxx sense) a piece of the type referenced by p from a valid position in the board to another valid position.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AtaxxMove

        public AtaxxMove()
        This constructor should be used ONLY to get an instance of AtaxxMove to generate game moves from strings by calling #fromString(String)

        Solo se debe usar este constructor para obtener objetos de AtaxxMove para generar movimientos a partir de strings usando el metodo #fromString(String)

      • AtaxxMove

        public AtaxxMove(int oldRow,
                 int oldCol,
                 int row,
                 int col,
                 Piece p)
        Constructs a move for placing (int the ataxx sense) a piece of the type referenced by p from a valid position in the board to another valid position.

        In this case we consider a valid position somewhere in the closed ball of radius 2 (if we are in the d_infinite distance topology).

        Parameters:
        oldRow -
        oldCol -
        row -
        col -
        p -

        Description copied from class: GameMove
        An abstract method for executing the move on the given board and a list of pieces.

        Ejecuta el movimiento en el tablero board con la lista de fichas pieces.

        execute in class GameMove
        Parameters:
        board - A board on which the move operates.

        Tablero sobre el que se realiza el movimiento.

        pieces - A list of pieces that are involved in the game.

        Lista de fichas de todos los jugadores

      • inBoard

        private boolean inBoard(int x,
                        int y,
                        int dim)
        Given a position and the dimension of the squared board, decides if the position is in or out of the board.
        Parameters:
        x - row
        y - column
        dim - dimension
        Returns:
        true if in, false if not.

      • fromString

        public GameMove fromString(Piece p,
                           java.lang.String str)
        This move can be constructed from a string of the form "oldRow SPACE oldCol SPACE row SPACE col".
        Specified by:
        fromString in class GameMove
        str - a string that represents a move.

        String que representa un movimiento.

        Returns:
        An instance of (a subclass of) GameMove that corresponds to the move as described by cmd.

        un objeto de (una subclase de) GameMove que se corresponde con el movimiento descrito por cmd.

      • createMove

        protected GameMove createMove(int oldRow,
                              int oldCol,
                              int row,
                              int col,
                              Piece p)
        Creates a move that is called from fromString(Piece, String). Separating it from that method allows us to use this class for other similar games by overriding this method.
        Parameters:
        oldRow - row from we move
        oldCol - column from we move
        row - row where we move
        col - column where we move
        p - piece we move
        Returns:
        an instance of AtaxxMove

      • help

        public java.lang.String help()
        Description copied from class: GameMove
        Generates a string that describes the move. It should describe the format supported by GameMove.fromString(Piece, String).

        Genera un string que describe el movimiento. Debe describir el formato soportado por GameMove.fromString(Piece, String).

        Specified by:
        help in class GameMove
        Returns:
        A help message.

        Mensaje de ayuda.
